mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES ( seq_board_no.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_date, b.user_no, s.name FROM board b, users s where b.user_no = s.no and b.no=#{no}

SELECT COUNT(no) FROM board
where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
